mapper.select: SELECT CAST(msu.id AS CHAR) AS "id", msu.username AS "username", msu.nickname AS "nickname", msu.phone AS "phone", msu.mobile AS "mobile", msu.email AS "email", msu.province_regioncode AS "provinceRegionCode", msrp.region_name AS "provinceRegionName", msu.city_regioncode AS "cityRegionCode", msrc.region_name AS "cityRegionName", msu.address AS "address", msu.profile AS "profile", msu.notify_message AS "notifyMessage", msu.notify_todo AS "notifyTodo", msu.avatar AS "avatar", GROUP_CONCAT(msr.role_code) AS "roles" FROM sys_user msu LEFT JOIN sys_region msrp ON msu.province_regioncode = msrp.region_code LEFT JOIN sys_region msrc ON msu.city_regioncode = msrc.region_code LEFT JOIN sys_role_user msru ON msu.id = msru.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role msr ON msr.id = msru.role_id WHERE msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND msu.tenant_code = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT role_code AS "roleCode" FROM sys_user msu LEFT JOIN sys_role_user msru ON msu.id = msru.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role msr ON msru.role_id = msr.id AND msu.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT role_code AS "roleCode" FROM sys_user msu LEFT JOIN sys_role_user msru ON msu.id = msru.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role msr ON msru.role_id = msr.id AND msu.mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
